span.span: Called to determine the postback data collection.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于某些设备处理回发以不同的方式，此方法允许修改集合的适配器。Because some devices handle postback differently from others, this method allows the adapter to modify the collection. 和如果帖子源自于不同页面，此方法的实现收集控制数据。The and implementations of this method gather control data if the post originated from a different page. 实现将执行回发数据的特定于 CHTML 的处理。The implementation performs CHTML-specific handling of postback data.

span.span: Called if an unhandled exception occurs during the life cycle of the page.

in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 适配器可以选择处理异常并呈现一条错误消息。An adapter can choose to handle the exception and render an error message. 该方法将返回`true`如果处理错误。The method returns `true` if it handles the error. 有关类，此实现不执行任何操作并返回`false`。For the class, this implementation does nothing and returns `false`. 有关类，此实现中的 WML 格式错误，并返回`true`。For the class, this implementation formats the error for WML and returns `true`.
